name: DragonWarriors Back In The Fight Demo (MULTIPLAYER)
name_original: DragonWarriors Back In The Fight Demo (MULTIPLAYER)
description:
This is my very first game and a DEMO now remember its a demo bc the characters are balls with v's on them and theres a lot of bugs and i mean alot so keep in mind its a demo pls alright enjoy the Game

Description:

Long long ago you were battling Evil Warriors as the DragonWarriors and you won so the dragonwarriors went into deepsleep to fight any evil in the future but the warriors come back many years later called the forgotten warriors so now its the red dragonwarrior and the rest of the dragonwarriors job to defeat the forgotten warriors so you go to place's defeat forgotten warriors and at the end of each level theres a elemental boss and each time you defeat a elemental boss you win the level (oh and the dragonwarriors can control the same elements as the boss the the dragonwarriors color should indicate which element they use (and the abilites but i havent made them yet))

Directions To Bosses and In order:

"WaterBoss(Still in development)"Left, "LavaBoss"Right, "LightningBoss(still in development)"Up, "MetalCrookBoxerBoss(still in development)"Down

Controls:

"W"up, "D"left, "A"right, "S"down, "LeftMouse"Attack. 

Controls (player 2) (you can only control player 2 with xbox controller)

joystick right, left, up, down, makes the player go right, left, up, down,

A button makes player 2 attack
